name: Brainworks Bootcamp
description: Brainworks is a full stack JavaScript Bootcamp located in the heart of Boston that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer

name: Freneticks Bootcamp
description: Freneticks has one goal, and that is to make you a rockstar developer and/or designer with a six figure salary. We teach both development and UI/UX

name: Catalunya
description: Is coding your passion? Catalunya will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in full stack web development and data science

name: TheHub Bootcamp
description: Is coding your passion? TheHub will give you the skills and the tools to become the best developer possible. We specialize in front end and full stack web development
